dynamic-hibernate.query: select t from Register t left join t.doctor d Where t.delFlag = :delFlag #if($deptId && $deptId.length() > 0) AND d.deptId = :deptId #end #if($chooseDate) AND t.chooseDate = :chooseDate #end #if($userId && $userId.length() > 0) AND t.userId = :userId #end order by t.chooseDate desc,t.timeRange asc

select r.id,r.user_id as userId,r.doctor_id as doctorId,r.register_time as registerTime,r.choose_date as chooseDate, r.am,r.time_range as timeRange,r.finish_time as finishTime,r.sort from register r where r.del_flag = :delFlag #if($doctorId && $doctorId.length() > 0) AND (r.doctor_id = :doctorId) #end #if($chooseDate) AND (r.choose_date = :chooseDate) #end #if($timeRange && $timeRange.length() > 0) AND (r.time_range = :timeRange) #end #if($status && $status.length() > 0) AND (r.status = :status) #end #if($am && $am.length() > 0) AND (r.am = :am) #end #if($userId && $userId.length() > 0) AND (r.user_id = :userId) #end order by r.time_range,r.sort
